caAdmin.title: CA Admin
caAdmin.blurb: Full cycle re-design of internal employee-facing tool for unification & increased efficiency, from research to hi-fi design with CS lead and PM.

landingPage.title: Landing Pages
landingPage.blurb: Designed company landing pages to inform & convert users, aligning marketing goals with development constraints through close collaboration.
landingPage.team: Me, Product Manager, Customer Support Team Lead
landingPage.challenge: Re-design the in-house tool used by the CS team
landingPage.goal: Improve the efficiency of the CS team member’s workflow
landingPage.context: The brief that was given at the beginning of this task was the following: create a more unified interface, reduce the clicks, improve search function, integrating with other tools used by CS team, visual simplification of the UI

mobileHome.title: New User Churn
mobileHome.blurb: Analysed user data and developed wireframes to reduce first-time user churn, focused on improvements to the homepage & onboarding flows.

abTest.title: A/B Testing
abTest.blurb: A/B tested company web pages, resulting in ~12-17% conversion rate increase. Improved the testing process with more targeted goal tracking.
abTest.team: Me, Product Manager, Customer Support Team Lead
abTest.challenge: Re-design the in-house tool used by the CS team
abTest.goal: Improve the efficiency of the CS team member’s workflow
abTest.context: The brief that was given at the beginning of this task was the following: create a more unified interface, reduce the clicks, improve search function, integrating with other tools used by CS team, visual simplification of the UI

jollyRoom.title: Jolly Room
jollyRoom.blurb: Built a responsive website with JS, HTML, CSS, GSAP, and Astro; developed brand identity, design system, and original venue photography.
